term.title: slow neutrons

item.text: Neutrons of kinetic energy less than some specified value. This value may vary over a wide range and depends on the application. In reactor physics, the value is frequently chosen to be 1 eV; in dosimetry, the effective cadmium cut-off is used.

item.title: effective cadmium cut-off (in nuclear analytical chemistry)
